languages.text: {n}Сороритка тепло улыбается.{/n} "Боевая девочка! У нее дух настоящей Сестры битвы. Но когда я смотрю на ее семью, то радуюсь, что о ней есть кому позаботиться, и Император не призвал ее на нашу стезю служения пламенем и оружием".

{n}Argenta smiles warmly.{/n} "A feisty one, isn't she? She has the spirit of a true Sister of Battle. But when I look at her family, I am glad she has someone to take care of her and that the Emperor did not call her to serve Him with weapons and fire as we do."
languages.original_text: {n}Сороритка тепло улыбается.{/n} "Боевая девочка! У нее дух настоящей Сестры битвы. Но когда я смотрю на ее семью, то радуюсь, что о ней есть кому позаботиться, и Император не призвал ее на нашу стезю служения пламенем и оружием".

languages.text: {n}Argenta sonríe con cariño{/n}. «Es toda una luchadora. Tiene el espíritu de una Hermana de Batalla pero, cuando echo un vistazo a su familia, me alegro de que alguien cuide de ella y de que el Emperador no la haya llamado para formar en el ejército».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta smiles warmly.{/n} "A feisty one, isn't she? She has the spirit of a true Sister of Battle. But when I look at her family, I am glad she has someone to take care of her and that the Emperor did not call her to serve Him with weapons and fire as we do."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta sonríe con cariño{/n}. «Es toda una luchadora. Tiene el espíritu de una Hermana de Batalla pero, cuando echo un vistazo a su familia, me alegro de que alguien cuide de ella y de que el Emperador no la haya llamado para formar en el ejército».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは暖かい笑顔を見せた。{/n}「気が強いでしょう？真の戦士の精神を持っている。でも、彼女の家族を見ていると、面倒を見てくれているようでよかったと思うし、皇帝が私たちのように武器や火を使って主に仕えるようにと彼女を召されなかったのを嬉しく思うよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta smiles warmly.{/n} "A feisty one, isn't she? She has the spirit of a true Sister of Battle. But when I look at her family, I am glad she has someone to take care of her and that the Emperor did not call her to serve Him with weapons and fire as we do."

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタは暖かい笑顔を見せた。{/n}「気が強いでしょう？真の戦士の精神を持っている。でも、彼女の家族を見ていると、面倒を見てくれているようでよかったと思うし、皇帝が私たちのように武器や火を使って主に仕えるようにと彼女を召されなかったのを嬉しく思うよ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔温和低笑了起来。{/n}“她可真是个暴躁的小家伙，是吧？她有着战斗修女的精神。不过，当我看到她的家人时，我很庆幸有人在照顾她。我也很高兴帝皇没有将她召唤入伍，没有要求她像我们一样，通过武器与烈焰来侍奉祂。”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta smiles warmly.{/n} "A feisty one, isn't she? She has the spirit of a true Sister of Battle. But when I look at her family, I am glad she has someone to take care of her and that the Emperor did not call her to serve Him with weapons and fire as we do."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔温和低笑了起来。{/n}“她可真是个暴躁的小家伙，是吧？她有着战斗修女的精神。不过，当我看到她的家人时，我很庆幸有人在照顾她。我也很高兴帝皇没有将她召唤入伍，没有要求她像我们一样，通过武器与烈焰来侍奉祂。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta lächelt freundlich.{/n} "Da hat jemand Temperament, was? Sie hat den Kampfgeist einer wahren Schwester der Schlacht. Aber wenn ich mir ihre Familie so ansehe, bin ich froh, dass sich jemand um sie kümmert und sie der Imperator nicht zwingt, Ihm mit Waffen und Feuer zu dienen, wie wir es tun."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta smiles warmly.{/n} "A feisty one, isn't she? She has the spirit of a true Sister of Battle. But when I look at her family, I am glad she has someone to take care of her and that the Emperor did not call her to serve Him with weapons and fire as we do."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta lächelt freundlich.{/n} "Da hat jemand Temperament, was? Sie hat den Kampfgeist einer wahren Schwester der Schlacht. Aber wenn ich mir ihre Familie so ansehe, bin ich froh, dass sich jemand um sie kümmert und sie der Imperator nicht zwingt, Ihm mit Waffen und Feuer zu dienen, wie wir es tun."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta esquisse un sourire chaleureux.{/n} « Courageuse, cette petite, vous ne trouvez pas ? Elle a la force de caractère d'une vraie Sœur de Bataille. Mais quand je vois sa famille, je suis bien contente qu'elle ait quelqu'un pour prendre soin d'elle, et que l'Empereur ne l'ait pas appelée à Le servir par les armes et le feu comme nous. »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta smiles warmly.{/n} "A feisty one, isn't she? She has the spirit of a true Sister of Battle. But when I look at her family, I am glad she has someone to take care of her and that the Emperor did not call her to serve Him with weapons and fire as we do."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta esquisse un sourire chaleureux.{/n} « Courageuse, cette petite, vous ne trouvez pas ? Elle a la force de caractère d'une vraie Sœur de Bataille. Mais quand je vois sa famille, je suis bien contente qu'elle ait quelqu'un pour prendre soin d'elle, et que l'Empereur ne l'ait pas appelée à Le servir par les armes et le feu comme nous. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta samimiyetle gülümsüyor.{/n} "Yürekli bir kız, değil mi? Hakiki bir Harp Rahibesi ruhu barındırıyor. Ancak ailesine bakıyorum da iyi ki kendisine göz kulak olacak birisine sahip, iyi ki İmparator bizim gibi silah ve ateşle hizmet etmesini emretmemiş."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta smiles warmly.{/n} "A feisty one, isn't she? She has the spirit of a true Sister of Battle. But when I look at her family, I am glad she has someone to take care of her and that the Emperor did not call her to serve Him with weapons and fire as we do."
